body: Dear Abraham, Thanks for your explain and extremely sorry for my delay. I am clear now!  I reviewed most of the results' files and felt a bit confused about the target temperature. What's the target temperature does it refer to under this circumstance? It should be our designed indoor temperature and the degree from target temperature should be the difference between the actual indoor temperature and the target temperature. Am I right?  Below is the 2 places where we can set our temperature: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ByfmOiw6oWhAi0DBuG46Pjl8ULI1WzEtkPL4n4uxRuzko7GsODaPzFpHukTPk*daNiSmACnUglPKX7cdzJYKG1K4zjHf0453/111.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ByfmOiw6oWgg0BEmQ1VAXGYlaVDYYk0gSZwueETcbW-keaQFXmxdAc0W2ZEhWXHgIOSvt5pkalbKXRyOjIZBSO9ppb2V6DPI/2222.png) Thanks for your explain!
